class (HashAlgorithm (HASH c), HashAlgorithm (ADDRHASH c), DSIGNAlgorithm (DSIGN c), KESAlgorithm (KES c), VRFAlgorithm (VRF c), ContextDSIGN (DSIGN c) ~ (), ContextKES (KES c) ~ (), ContextVRF (VRF c) ~ (), Typeable c) ⇒ Crypto c where
  • type HASH c ∷ Type
  • type ADDRHASH c ∷ Type
  • type DSIGN c ∷ Type
  • type KES c ∷ Type
  • type VRF c ∷ Type
name: Crypto HASH ADDRHASH DSIGN KES VRF

display_html:
data HotKey c m = HotKey {
  • evolve ∷ KESPeriod → m KESEvolutionInfo
  • getInfo ∷ m KESInfo
  • isPoisoned ∷ m Bool
  • sign_ ∷ ∀ toSign. (Signable (KES c) toSign, HasCallStack) ⇒ toSign → m (SignedKES (KES c) toSign)
}
name: HotKey HotKey evolve getInfo isPoisoned sign_

  • sgMaxKESEvolutions ∷ !Word64

  • sgMaxLovelaceSupply ∷ !Word64

}
